Description.SourceString: A common perk that increases the ATK stat of all heroes. Each point of ATK increases the damage the Hero deals by 1. Heroes gain a small flat bonus, plus a percentage bonus based on their ATK value.
Description.LocalizedString: A common perk that increases the ATK stat of all heroes. Each point of ATK increases the damage the Hero deals by 1. Heroes gain a small flat bonus, plus a percentage bonus based on their ATK value.
